title: Otterton Mill
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Bakery, British, English, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe, farm shop, and bakery onsite. The majority of the produce is either made onsite or bought from local suppliers. Not shown on its website and menu are specials of which there is always a vegan main and vegan soup, marked "ve." Vegan main might be a 5-bean chilli with rice or barley and root vegetable stew. Usually has vegan flapjack if you ask. Soya milk is available for hot drinks.
